Title.Language: Introduction to the Coptic Catholic Epistle

Comment.Language: If the catholic Epistle is read in Coptic, the following introduction is chanted.
وإذا قرئ الكاثوليكون قبطياً تقال مقدمته وهي:

Text.Language: The Catholic Epistle of our father (...), my beloved.

Comment.Language: The catholic Epistle is chanted in Coptic.

Title.Language: Conclusion to the Coptic Catholic Epistle

Comment.Language: After the reading, the following conclusion is chanted.

Text.Language: Nac~n/ou m~permenre pikocmoc oude n/etsop qen pikocmoc: pikocmoc nacini nem tefe~piyumia: v/ de eti~ri m~v~ouws m~Vnou] f~naswpi sa e~neh: a~m/n.
Do not love the world or the things in the world. The world is passing away, and its lust; but he who does the will of God abides forever. Amen.
لا تحبوا العالم ولا الأشياء التي في العالم. العالم يمضي وشهواته. والذي يصنع إرادة الله يدوم إلى الأبد. آمين.
